website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a futon that offers both looks and comfort, this is the one to get. Though a bit challenging to pull out into a bed, this is a minor issue considering all it has to offer.
pros: Handsome, sturdy wood frame and supportive, 6" coil mattress
Attractive styling that fits most rooms and decor
cons: Somewhat difficult to convert to a bed

customer_reviews.title: Six Coils are Super
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble althougth the "tool" they include is rather barbaric. Use a socket wrench to tighten the bolts. Saves time and ensures stability. Other than that this futon is VERY comfortable and of good quality. Having six coils within the mattress vs just stuffing makes all the difference. Whether sitting on as a sofa or sleeping as a futon, this product is solid. Also looks very nice with the rest of my mid-century decor.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Two start review because it looks nice, and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an everyday futon, look elsewhere. Two start review because it looks nice, and was easy to assemble, but it's horrendous otherwise. It's not a comfortable or functionally sound piece. It will make your body sore after sitting more than 30 minutes. Want to turn it into a bed? First Pull it 4 feet away from the wall, then attempt to put it into bed mode. Want to turn it back into a couch? This will require you to flip the entire couch on it's back and forcefully wedge it back into couch position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a futon but hated the look of most. This is very sleek and stylish! Real wood sides and is very comfy as a couch (haven't slept on it yet). Was so hesitant because there were no reviews when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Livia Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying this futon!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the futon for 35 days! I live alone and work full time. It has been minimally used. I have been using it as a guest bed and couch. Today I sat on the left side and the metal frame ripped from the wood frame, splitting the wood in half. I'm lucky that my dog was not sleeping under it when this happened. Since it is over 30 days, I cannot return it. I bought this because it had good ratings. I'm not sure why. The piece looks nice but the mattress springs are uncomfortable. I'm going to have to pay money to either have it fixed or thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in home office/guest bed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my home office! We have a spare room already, but found we needed to accommodate for more ppl so we wanted a futon for my office and this worked out nicely! Not very comfortable to sit on so I imagine sleeping isn't the best so I have a down comforter to throw on top for my guests! Very easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H

customer_reviews.title: FUTON IS JUST RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I found the Bergen Futon I received recently to be just what I need. I am trying to downsize some and I decided to use a futon instead of a queen size bed in my extra bedroom to free up some space and it works perfectly. The cover is nice and heavy and the mattress seems to be comfortable as far as I can tell so far. Thanks for this order/ MM of TEXX
customer_reviews.author: MM of Texas

customer_reviews.title: This couch is awesome. For a metal framed futon
customer_reviews.text: This couch is awesome. For a metal framed futon, the quality is there. The frame was easy enough for a 13 year old to build as mine did. The wood adds a nice accent to the already nice mattress. The mattress is also of good quality and is very comfortable. the same 13 year old who built it also slept on it that same night and loved it. It is in our living room being used as a couch, but when pulled out, it feels sturdy and comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Polito

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Impossible to manueuver into flat or couch position without two people. The mattress is like sitting on bare metal coils. I hate it and pissed I spent the money on it. Never mind that it arrived with one of the arm rests broken - I was even willing to over look that. It still sux.
customer_reviews.author: HookBiter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, very comfy, and easy to put together. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Waste if Money
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well packed. Was easy to assemble. Once you convert it to a bed it is impossible to put it back in seating position unless you remove the mattress (which is so heavy you need 2 people to handle it) put the frame in sitting position and then put the mattress back on Sleeping on it was also not comfortable for an adult. Maybe its ok for kids. Otherwise I cannot recommend it. The look is nice, the wood on the arms looks ok also.
customer_reviews.author: Leeza A.

customer_reviews.title: I am totally happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I have had this now for well over a month. I am totally happy with this. It is comfortable to sit on. I have lower back issues, and I can sit on this comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jonie Phillipi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this very uncomfortable but it's not all that nice to look at. The fabric looks and feels like a hemp sac and the cushion, or lack thereof, is all springs. I would never sleep on this. After 15 mins of sitting on it, I felt very uncomfortable. I was hoping it would be different after a few days but it's not. And it's not something you can just pack back up and ship. Totally not worth the extra money. I should have saved $100 and bought a cheaper one from Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable futon I've ever sat or laid on. Easy assembly with great instructions and markers on the parts so you don't get them backwards. It was well packed, and none of the parts were missing or damaged. It even comes with a touchup marker to hide any scratches you might cause during assembly. Seems pretty sturdy as well. Don't hear much creaking or feel anything bending when I sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: M dubb

customer_reviews.title: Great futon for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our daughter's first apartment. We were pleasantly surprised! I expected it to be light weight mainly because of the price, but it's not. It's made really well--very sturdy. The mattress is a little hard so we put a cheap foam topper on it and it worked great--very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice futon that looks exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is much heavier than I expected. It is a very nice futon that looks exactly as pictured, it's well made, and is very comfortable. I added a few colorful throw pillows to compliment it. It was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: lisa w

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Replaced my bed w this and Im very happy w it. Easy to set up, sturdy, and comfortable. Also arrived a week and a half early which is always awesome! If i had one complaint it would be that it takes a little effort to convert from bed to couch but its honestly not that bad. (And it converts from couch to bed in a snap)
customer_reviews.author: Toast

customer_reviews.title: ... the play room because most of them had more bad reviews than good
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a futon for the play room because most of them had more bad reviews than good. I was thrilled to see all of the positive feedback on this one and went with it. It is very easy to lay it down to sleep on but does need two sets of hands to put it back upright. The mattress is decent and while it's not as thick as a regular mattress it's not bad to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: TOMMY B

customer_reviews.title: broke after one year of use
customer_reviews.text: The futon was used as a couch most of the time and a bed twice for a few days each. It never had more than three people on it at a time. The wood split where the metal frame was screwed in the same way as many of the photos you see.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Crane-jacke

customer_reviews.title: This futon is very comfortable according to my daughter who sleeps on it when ...
customer_reviews.text: This futon is very comfortable according to my daughter who sleeps on it when she comes to visit. The only problem I have with it is that it's hard to fold it up again once in the flat position. Guess I need to work on it. The frame is sturdy and the mattress good quality. I did buy a cover for it to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: bookluver

customer_reviews.title: and sturdy. It's been perfect for my purposes so I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: It's simple, cheap, and sturdy. It's been perfect for my purposes so I'm giving it 5 stars. I'm a college student on a budget and I've been using it as a bed. It's comfortable enough. It sometimes makes a few metallic noises when I shift my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: OK at best.
customer_reviews.text: Front section arrived bent, but still functional. Very difficult to collapse back to a couch and put out as a bed. Basically takes two people. Seat cushion looks nowhere as neat and crisp as picture. Not happy with this purchase and certainly wouldn't recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put this together in under an hour. Very nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea LaTulippe

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up; however so far we've had to take the mattress off to get it to fold back up into a couch. I"m hoping that with time, and "muscle memory" the mattress will fold up with the couch easier. Slept on it on our covered porch last night, not really the most comfortable mattress in the world, but for the price, and for the amount we'll be using it, it's great. May get a pad to slip into the cover so that it's a little more comfortable, even for sitting. Looks great though.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Wuestenberg

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but arrived damaged in several places.
customer_reviews.text: The futon is comfortable, simple, and easy to put together. However, it arrived damaged in several places. Many of the wooden pieces were dented and one of the metal crossbeams was severely bent. Ordinarily I would return it for a new one immediately but due to the size of the item, it would take time to dismantle and repackage. Time that I do not have. Not to mention that I don't even have a car large enough to bring it to a shipping facility, nor the strength to lift it on my own. This is a good product for the price but the distributor needs to get their act together to ensure that their shipments are properly taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Fine

customer_reviews.title: This futon is great! It's very sturdy and well made and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This futon is great! It's very sturdy and well made and easy to assemble. Oh yeah and very comfortable too. My husband and I went to a least 5 different furniture stores looking for a futon, all the mattresses were thin and uncomfortable. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. I had thought of going with a sleeper-sofa, but this was much more economical and very likely more comfortable. I've had a few guests stay the night on it and all have said it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: The assembly and aesthetic of the unit are great, but the safety is not
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our guest room and it was hardly used. The assembly and aesthetic of the unit are great, but the safety is not. After very mild use, we had a few friends sitting on it and it completely broke. Wood pieces, metal, and screws all just literally fell out. Don’t buy this, it’s not worth the injury.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within an hour
customer_reviews.text: First, this was supposed to arrive on Wednesday before our family arrived, and it didn't get here until Saturday. Maybe it was just a mix up with FedEx. Second, when assembling the futon, the mechanism that holds it in the couch position broke somehow and would not let us convert the futon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these at the same time one was delivered with damage to the box...didn’t think much of it until a week later when I’m putting it together.....and part of the frame was bent! Very unhappy about this! Thinking of sending BOTH BACK. I have a bad back and these are uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Solid, pretty, not comfortable for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: You need a cushion to sleep on it. However, it looks like the pic and is easy to assemble. The bed is EXTREMELY difficult to open. Looks great and is fine as a couch but I don’t recommend as a futon
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great futon. Not a nick or scratch
customer_reviews.text: Great futon. Not a nick or scratch. I am a senior citizen women and assembled it by my self . All the parts are high quality. The best part is that it is very comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy, color and style are as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy, color and style are as advertised. One negative-the mattress has a strong odor that hasn’t gone away. I thought it would air out but it’s been a few weeks and no change. *Update: Dropped rating to 2 stars. I do not recommend this product. The mattress still smells awful and the cover is not removable so I can’t clean it. It’s also impossible for one person to convert it from bed to couch.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Gann

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Easy to assemble. Though mattress is not quite what I expected, still a very good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: cutiejudy

customer_reviews.title: I would like that bottom right side replaced
customer_reviews.text: I tried opening the bed this evening for the first time and the right side panel wood splintered. the bed will not open because the mechanism no longer has a place to sit. I would like that bottom right side replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn J Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Hard as rock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this futon for a family member to stay with me over Thanksgiving Holiday. After the first night they had a backache from the mattress being so hard. We ended up with the queen air mattress. Have to say I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I should have just returned it but needed a futon quickly. It is difficult to put together and took a long time. The armrests are a greenish beige (do not look like wood) so i spray painted them black since I hated the color. The mattress is cheap. after one use, I can no longer close it. Totally not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This futon Is very nice looking. Hard to pull up from bed to couch for one person.
customer_reviews.author: bearhart

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item. We've used this for a year and the bed is still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over a year with rare usage. Broke with two people sitting on it . Can I get this replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Julie Christofferson

customer_reviews.title: Great Futon!
customer_reviews.text: This futon seems very well made, I especially like the springs in the mattress. Unlike others that I've looked at, it doesn't look like it will lose it's shape. It is a bit difficult to put down and back up. It takes two people but other than that, it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Joanie O

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Comfortable for a Futon. A little hard to adjust from flat to upright; it take two people.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The best futon I’ve ever tried
customer_reviews.text: The best futon I’ve ever tried. It’s hard to put it back together on your own. It’s not the softest, but quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Graves

customer_reviews.title: Bergen Wood Arm Futon
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this product. It's comfortable and the fabric is better than we expected. It fits perfect in our home office space.
customer_reviews.author: GBR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not folled it out yet. I added a full pillow topper and a cove. So much better
customer_reviews.author: Angel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap. Broken at the base with only two people sitting on it. Although we did get spooked watching Stranger Things, we certainly did not expect the futon to break like that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sleeping bed.
customer_reviews.text: 20 minute assembly if you’re doing alone and it’s easy to put down and up however you want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: If you are picky about everything in life then this futon won't be for you. I can feel the springs when I sit down but overall its comfortable. Comfortable to sleep on too and it fits in a dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, was super easy to put together, and is pretty comfortable. Full size sheets fit even though it's not a standard full size mattress. The only two things I don't like is that it squeaks a little bit because the frame is metal (but this is minimal) and it's a almost impossible to move back to the sitting position without a second person. All in all, I'd recommend it though.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble and it is a very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Susi Woodley

customer_reviews.title: Great futon
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together!! It is very nice looking, not too bulky and the mattress is comfortable and durable. I can't seem to close it with the mattress in it, but I'm sure with help I'll figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: DaniD

customer_reviews.title: Expectations exceeded!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: Expectations were exceeded when this futon arrived! So big & comfy! The price was great and the quality of product received makes me write this review! I have one happy college kid! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: krisnlolo

customer_reviews.title: Futon
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the futon and it was not hard to put together. The only thing I'm having an issue with is I have to take off the cushion any order to put the futon up in setting position
customer_reviews.author: Anita Adams

customer_reviews.title: both hinges broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for the delivery, it arrived damaged. Update, both hinges bent on springs while folding the second time. Useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sitting and sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Using in the living room when it's too painfully to go upstairs. Comfortable as couch or bed. Getting used to converting from bed to couch. Have to practice more to learn the actions of the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T
